TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataKey extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public Class DataKey Implements IEquatable(Of DataKey), IStateManager
type DataKey = class interface IStateManager interface IEquatable<DataKey>

summary.span: 表示数据绑定控件中某个记录的一个或多个主键字段。

span.span: Represents the primary key field or fields of a record in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示数据绑定控件中的记录的主键。The class is used to represent the primary key for a record in a data-bound control. 记录的主键可以由数据源中的一个或多个字段组成。The primary key for a record can be composed of one of more fields from the data source. 尽管类不是集合, 但它可以存储多个键字段值。Although the class is not a collection, it can store multiple key field values. 调用类的构造函数之一时, 将填充键字段值。The key field values are populated when one of the constructors for the class is called. 可以通过以下方式从对象检索密钥字段值:You can retrieve a key field value from a object in the following ways: - 使用属性可检索对象中特定索引处的键字段值。 Use the property to retrieve a key field value at a specific index in the object. - 使用属性可检索特定字段的键字段值。Use the property to retrieve a key field value of a specific field. - 使用属性可检索对象中索引0处的键字段的值。 Use the property to retrieve the value of the key field at index 0 in the object. 当主键只包含一个字段时, 此属性通常用作检索记录的键值的快捷方式。This property is often used as a shortcut to retrieve the key value of a record when the primary key contains only one field. - 使用属性创建可用于循环访问键字段值的对象。 Use the property to create an object that can be used to iterate through the key field values. 通常, 当设置控件的`DataKeyNames`属性时, 数据绑定控件将自动生成对象。In general, objects are automatically generated by data-bound controls when the control's `DataKeyNames` property is set. 对象包含`DataKeyNames`属性中指定的一个或多个键字段的值。 The objects contain the values of the key field or fields specified in the `DataKeyNames` property. 每次显示一条记录的数据绑定控件 ( 如或) 通常存储控件的`DataKey`属性中显示的当前记录的对象。Data-bound controls that display a single record at a time (such as or ) generally store the object for the current record displayed in the `DataKey` property of the control. 一次显示多个记录的数据绑定控件 (如) 通常将控件中每个记录的对象存储在一个集合中。Data-bound controls that display multiple records at a time (such as ) generally store the objects for each record in the control in a collection. 然后 , 集合存储`DataKeys`在控件的属性中。The collection is then stored in the `DataKeys` property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对象的属性来确定控件中记录的主键值。The following code example demonstrates how to determine the primary key value of a record in a control using the property of a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyValue/CS/DataKeyValuecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyValue/VB/DataKeyValuevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的键字段值字典初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数可使用指定的键字段值字典创建类的新实例。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values. 为参数传入的对象中包含的字段值用于填充对象。 `keyTable`The field values contained in the object passed in for the `keyTable` parameter are used to populate the object. > [!NOTE] > 此版本的构造函数不允许提前为对象指定字段名称列表。This version of the constructor does not allow you to specify a list of field names in advance for the object. 由于未预先指定字段名称, 因此字段名称和值都存储在视图状态中。Because the field names are not specified in advance, both the field names and values are stored in view state. 若要预先指定字段名称的列表, 请使用构造函数。To specify a list of field names in advance, use the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary keyTable, string[] keyNames) cil managed
Public Sub New (keyTable As IOrderedDictionary, keyNames As String())

span.span: The key field values.

param.name: keyNames
param.span: 包含键字段名称的字符串数组。

span.span: An array of strings that contain the names of the key fields.

summary.span: 使用指定的键字段值字典和字段名数组初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建类的新实例, 使用指定的键字段值字典和字段名称数组。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names. 为参数传入的对象中包含的字段值用于填充对象。 `keyTable`The field values contained in the object passed in for the `keyTable` parameter are used to populate the object. 此构造函数还允许您 `keyNames`通过参数提前为对象指定键字段名称的列表。This constructor also allows you to specify a list of the key field names for the object in advance through the `keyNames` parameter. 由于预先指定了字段名称, 因此, 在使用此构造函数时, 只会将键字段值存储在视图状态中。Because the field names are specified in advance, only the key field values are stored in view state when this constructor is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于确定对象是否正在跟踪其视图状态更改。 The property is used to determine whether the object is tracking its view-state changes. > [!NOTE] > 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 加载以前保存的 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Loads the previously saved view state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用, 不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过, 控件开发人员可以重写此方法, 以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法用于加载以前保存的对象的视图状态。 The method is used to load the previously saved view state of the object.

exception.span: 不是 ，无法解析为有效的 。

span.span: is not and cannot be resolved to a valid .

para.span: 扩展类时, 可以重写此方法, 以实现自己的例程, 以便加载对象的视图状态。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to implement your own routine to load the view state for the object.

summary.span: 标记开始跟踪并将视图状态更改保存到 对象的起点。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写此方法, 以标记开始跟踪并将对对象所做的更改作为对象的视图状态的一部分进行保存的起始点。This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the object as part of the object's view state.

summary.span: 获取 对象中索引 0 位置的键字段值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性作为快捷键来确定对象中索引0处的键字段的值, 而不是使用或属性来从对象中检索键字段值。Instead of using the or the property to retrieve a key field value from a object, you can use the property as a shortcut to determine the value of the key field at index 0 in the object. 当记录仅有一个键字段时, 此属性通常用于确定记录的键字段值。This property is commonly used to determine the key field value of a record when the record has only one key field. > [!NOTE] > 如果对象不包含任何键字段, `null`则返回。 If the object does not contain any key fields, `null` is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定记录的主键值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the primary key value of a record.
